FontColor Struct Reference

#include <FontColor.h>

Collaboration diagram for FontColor:

Detailed Description

Font color of a character.

This struct represents the color of font that a character has. The color value is stored using the RGB color space with 256 values per component, and the three components separated.

Author:
Eliezer Talón (elitalon@gmail.com)

FontColor::FontColor ( unsigned int  red,
unsigned int  green,
unsigned int  blue 
)

Constructor.

Initializes a FontColor object with the components set to the values passed. Since the color must be expressed using a RGB scale of 256 possible values, any value over 255 will be truncated
